attributes.action: Added charge to illegal gun and knife carrying law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By making an added charge of "Carrying a knife or Gun with INTENT to harm", within enforced laws. Because there is absolutely no reason whatsoever for any law abiding person to have in their possession an open bladed knife, or gun on the pretence of 'self defence'. These offensive, and deadly weapons can be,and will be if the occassion arises, used 'intentionaly' to harm, and possibly kill, whether they used for self defence or offence. Craft and Stanley knives could also be included if carried in the wrong environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
